thread.title: Former Orlando Predator Jeremy Geathers dies after limo strikes him in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Former Orlando Predator Jeremy Geathers dies after limo strikes him in Las Vegas

author: Stephen Ruiz
title: Former Orlando Predator Jeremy Geathers dies after limo strikes him in Las Vegas
text:
Sports Orlando Predators Former Orlando Predator Jeremy Geathers dies after limo strikes him in Las Vegas Former Orlando Predators defensive lineman Jeremy Geathers died after being struck by a limousine early Saturday morning in Las Vegas. Jacob Langston/Orlando Sentinel Former Orlando Predators defensive lineman Jeremy Geathers died after being struck by a limousine early Saturday morning in Las Vegas. Former Orlando Predators defensive lineman Jeremy Geathers died after being struck by a limousine early Saturday morning in Las Vegas. (Jacob Langston/Orlando Sentinel) Stephen Ruiz defensive lineman Jeremy Geathers has died.
Geathers was killed as he tried to cross a street and was struck by a limousine early Saturday morning in Las Vegas, the Las Vegas Review-Journal reported. Geathers, who reportedly was not at an intersection or marked crosswalk when the incident occurred, was 30. 
He is the son of former NFL defensive lineman James “Jumpy’’ Geathers and the cousin of former UCF and current Indianapolis Colts safety Clayton Geathers. 
Jeremy Geathers played at UNLV. He went undrafted in 2008 and played in the Canadian Football League and Arena Football League. He spent one season (2015) with the Predators, who folded operations in October. Caption Magic-Mavericks postgame interview: Frank Vogel
